sen.j: 院助（いんじょ、生年不詳 - 天仁元年12月12日 (旧暦)（1109年1月14日））は、平安時代の仏師。
sen.e: Injo (year of birth unknown-January 14, 1109) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist Statues) in the Heian period.
Injo (year of birth unknown - January 14, 1109) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist statues) in the Heian period.
Injo (year of birth unknown - January 14, 1109) was a busshi (sculptor of Buddhist statues) in the Heian period.
He was the founding father of the Inpa (In School).
He was the founding father of the Inpa (In School).
He was the founding father of the Inpa (In School).
He was the grandson of Jocho.
He was the grandson of Jocho.
He was the grandson of Jocho.
